arcs.justification: This arc establishes the central premise of choice between two doors in the white room, building anticipation through the protagonist's internal struggle with an irreversible decision
arcs.progression: Woman enters white room, contemplates the two doors, experiences mounting anticipation as she weighs her decision

beats.action: The protagonist awakens in a pristine white room with no memory of how they arrived
information_revealed: The protagonist is in an unfamiliar white room
They have no memory of arriving
information_withheld: How they got there
Who brought them
The purpose of the room

beats.action: The protagonist examines the featureless room and discovers it has no windows, no visible exit except for two identical doors
information_revealed: The room is completely sealed except for two doors
The doors appear identical
information_withheld: What lies beyond each door
Why there are exactly two doors
If this is a test or trap
beats.intention: Build claustrophobia and focus attention on the choice ahead

beats.action: The protagonist approaches the doors and notices subtle differences - one handle is slightly warm, the other cold
information_revealed: One door handle is warm
The other door handle is cold
information_withheld: The significance of the temperature difference
Which temperature indicates safety or danger
beats.intention: Introduce the first clues while maintaining ambiguity

beats.action: The protagonist realizes they must choose and begins weighing the implications of each door
information_revealed: A choice must be made
There is no obvious way back
information_withheld: The consequences of each choice
Whether this choice is reversible
If someone is watching or judging
beats.intention: Establish the central conflict and decision point

beats.action: The protagonist reaches toward one door handle, hesitates, then pulls their hand back to reconsider
information_revealed: The protagonist is uncertain and conflicted
information_withheld: Which door they were reaching for
What made them hesitate
Their final decision
beats.intention: Show internal struggle and build anticipation for the choice

scenes.conflict: The protagonist must choose between two mysterious doors without knowing what lies beyond either
scenes.justification: This scene establishes the central premise and begins the emotional journey from anticipation toward the climactic decision
scenes.objective: Establish the protagonist's arrival in the white room and initial confrontation with the two doors
scenes.sensory_anchor: The cold metal of the door handles against my palms

subtext.character_thinks: Internal struggle with internal conflict: The protagonist must choose between two mysterious doors without knowing what lies beyond either
subtext.reader_knows: Reader awareness of: Two doors in a white room

beats.action: The protagonist sits alone in her childhood bedroom, staring at an old photograph of her family
information_revealed: She has returned to her childhood home
Family relationships are significant to her decision
information_withheld: What specific choice she must make
Why she left home originally
beats.intention: Establish the emotional weight of her past and current isolation

beats.action: A memory surfaces of her father's disappointed face the last time they spoke
information_revealed: She has unresolved conflict with her father
Their last conversation was painful
information_withheld: What caused their falling out
Whether her father is still alive
beats.intention: Introduce guilt and regret as driving forces in her internal conflict

beats.action: She picks up her phone to call someone but hesitates, thumb hovering over the contact
information_revealed: She wants to reach out to someone
She struggles with making connections
information_withheld: Who she wants to call
What she would say if she called
beats.intention: Show her desire for connection battling against fear of vulnerability

beats.action: The sound of rain against the window triggers another memory of waiting for someone who never came
information_revealed: She has experienced abandonment before
Weather and waiting are emotional triggers for her
information_withheld: Who abandoned her
The circumstances of that abandonment
beats.intention: Deepen the sense of abandonment and reinforce her fear of being let down

beats.action: She realizes that avoiding the choice is itself a choice, and tears begin to fall
information_revealed: She understands that inaction has consequences
She is emotionally overwhelmed by this realization
information_withheld: What decision she will ultimately make
How this realization will change her actions
beats.intention: Create the pivotal moment where she acknowledges her agency and responsibility

beats.action: She wipes her eyes and looks at herself in the mirror, seeing both her younger and older selves
information_revealed: She is ready to confront her situation
She sees continuity between her past and present self
information_withheld: What specific action she will take next
How much time she has left to decide
beats.intention: Show her acceptance of her past while preparing to face her future

scenes.conflict: Growing pressure to decide while memories and fears cloud her judgment
scenes.justification: This scene transitions from anticipation to sadness, building toward the climactic moment while exploring the weight of past choices
scenes.objective: Deepen the protagonist's internal struggle as she weighs the implications of her choice
scenes.sensory_anchor: The sterile smell of the white room mixing with the salt of unshed tears

subtext.character_thinks: Internal struggle with internal conflict: Growing pressure to decide while memories and fears cloud her judgment
subtext.reader_knows: Reader awareness of: Two doors in a white room

arcs.justification: This arc delivers the climactic moment where anticipation peaks and transforms into action, fulfilling the core emotional journey of the choice premise
arcs.progression: The protagonist reaches her breaking point of deliberation and makes her choice, opening one of the doors

beats.action: The protagonist stands frozen before the two doors, her breathing shallow and rapid as the weight of indecision crushes down on her
information_revealed: The protagonist is experiencing severe anxiety
There are two doors to choose from
information_withheld: What lies behind each door
The consequences of choosing wrong
beats.intention: Establish the protagonist's paralyzed state and internal turmoil

beats.action: Memories of past failures and missed opportunities flood her mind, each one a voice whispering that she will choose wrong again
information_revealed: The protagonist has a history of poor decisions
She struggles with self-doubt
information_withheld: Specific details of past failures
Whether her self-doubt is justified
beats.intention: Deepen the internal conflict by revealing her history of self-doubt

beats.action: She reaches toward the left door, then pulls her hand back, then reaches for the right, caught in an endless loop of hesitation
information_revealed: The protagonist is physically unable to commit to either choice
information_withheld: Any distinguishing features of the doors
Time constraints she may be under
beats.intention: Show the physical manifestation of her indecision

beats.action: A distant sound echoes through the corridor behind her, reminding her that staying is no longer an option
information_revealed: There is immediate danger approaching
Inaction is not viable
information_withheld: The nature of the approaching threat
How much time she has left
beats.intention: Introduce external pressure that forces action

beats.action: With tears streaming down her face, she closes her eyes and places her trembling hand on the right door handle
information_revealed: The protagonist chooses the right door
The decision causes her significant emotional pain
information_withheld: Her reasoning for choosing right over left
What she expects to find
beats.intention: Show the emotional cost of the decision and the moment of commitment

beats.action: She turns the handle and steps through, the door closing behind her with a finality that echoes in her bones
information_revealed: The choice has been made and cannot be undone
The protagonist has crossed the threshold
information_withheld: What lies beyond the door
Whether she made the right choice
beats.intention: Complete the irreversible action and transition to consequences

scenes.conflict: Internal struggle between fear of the unknown and necessity of action culminates in irreversible decision
scenes.justification: This scene provides the climactic moment of decision that the entire narrative has been building toward, resolving the central tension while opening new narrative possibilities
scenes.objective: The protagonist reaches her breaking point and makes the decisive choice to open one of the doors
scenes.sensory_anchor: The cold metal of the door handle against my palm
